channel.title: Help with bg colours
channel.description:
I need some help with background colours.
The RGB colour for the colour i want teh background to be is: 128-128-128, So the Hex colour is 808080.. But when I do it, It loads fine, but then changes because part of the pictures are the same colour.
Look: http://www.pwndgfx.co.uk
